flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Remove the couplers and hex nipples at the elbow using a wrench.
lines.text_raw: Remove the couplers and hex nipples at the elbow using a wrench.

lines.text: Tighten the hoses (with thread tape) into the elbows.
lines.text_raw: Tighten the hoses (with thread tape) into the elbows.

guide.summary:
To save your quick couplers for something else, we recommend you remove the quick couplers used during fabrication, and replace them with fixed hydraulics.

This step is optional.
guide.title: Hard-Lining the Main Cylinder
